reference.title: Basic authoring
reference.shortdesc: DITA uses many authoring structures similar to HTML.

section.p: For the majority of your writing, you use elements that should be familiar. The following elements work exactly the same as HTML.
There are several elements that are not exactly the same as HTML, but are very similar.

ul.li: image — for inserting references to images.
note — for notes, tips, warnings, etc.
